duck: Pietro Perona, Italian-American engineering professor, co-author of anisotropic diffusion
Thriller Bark is the world's largest ship from the anime and manga One Piece and is owned by Gecko Moria of the Shichibukai.

wiki.text:
'Perona' is a surname. Notable people with the surname include:

* Bernard Perona, American author
* Joaquín Navarro Perona, Spanish footballer
* John Perona, Italian-American nightclub owner
* Pietro Perona, Italian-American engineering professor, co-author of
  anisotropic diffusion
* Renato Perona, Italian cyclist
wiki.title: perona
